title: Lawless
description:
Storyline:

Lawless (Love by Design: Jack's Stories 0.5)

Filled with Nora's exquisite storytelling and memorable characters, this rare Western historical romance is a unique treat for Nora's many fans. Lawless is editorially connected to Loving Jack and Best Laid Plans, which will be published in September 2003 in Love by Design.
author: Nora Roberts
